messages

Class ErrorResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • messages.Response
      • messages.ErrorResponse

  • public class ErrorResponse
extends Response
    This class is for creating an error response. It gets called when the RESTHandler catches an Exception from the ProjectService.
    See Also:
    RESTHandler, ProjectService

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorResponse(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String path)
      The constructor expects an error message in String and a path in String.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorResponse

        public ErrorResponse(java.lang.String message,
                     java.lang.String path)
        The constructor expects an error message in String and a path in String. The constructor also creates a timestamp at the moment the object gets created.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message in String
        path - the path in String (e.g.: "/addShape/projectID")
